description: A short hike after about 45mins of driving on logging roads. 4 wheel drive recommended.The first couple of kilometers is up a rough section of logging road. From where the trail begins it is about 15 or 20 min hike to the hut and another 10 mins up to the peak. Breathtaking views for such a short hike. This is part of the Sunshine Coast Trail. (SCT)
directions: From Saltery Bay drive 12 km to Dixon Road and drive until 4km untill it turns into Goat Lake Main. After 12 mile sign go left onto Spring Lake Main and follow until you see the sign and road on the left at around the 8 mile marker.
title: Tin Hat Mountain
